titleStmt.title: A godly learned and fruitfull sermon Made vpon the fourteenth of Iohn in which is plainely set foorth the true looue of Christ, the markes whereby the children of God are knovven and the commodities vvhich that looue bringeth. By D. S. 1584.
titleStmt.author: D. S., fl. 1584.
Jordan, John, fl. 1584.
Squier, Adam, d. 1588, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Yarath Iames, and Thomas Lawe and, are to be solde in newgate market ouer against Christe Chvrch gate,

notesStmt.note: Has manuscript attribution to D. Squire in Lambeth Palace Library copy of STC 21483.5.
Some print show-through; A7-8, torn, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: newgate market ouer against Christe Chvrch gate
